title: INtopBackup
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Blake Lively accuses co-star Justin Baldoni of smear campaign
items.description: Mr Baldoni's lawyer says the allegations are "categorically false" and a "desperate attempt to 'fix' her negative reputation".

items.title: Will convicted wife killer Scott Peterson get a new trial?
items.description: After California man's death sentence is overturned, there's a renewed push to clear him.

items.title: Lara Trump won't pursue Rubio's Florida Senate seat, she says
items.description: Lara Trump, the daughter-in-law of President-elect Donald Trump, says she's removing herself from consideration for Marco Rubio's Senate seat.

items.title: Sudan's biggest refugee camp was already struck with famine. Now it's being shelled
items.description: The siege, blamed on the Rapid Support Forces, has sparked a new humanitarian catastrophe and marks an alarming turning point in the Darfur region, al...

items.title: Gaza ceasefire talks 90% complete, Palestinian official tells BBC
items.description: The senior official said a ceasefire deal is close but key issues remain that need to be bridged.

items.title: Netflix is dreaming of a glitch-free Christmas with 2 major NFL games set
items.description: It comes weeks after Netflix's attempt to broadcast live boxing between Jake Paul and Mike Tyson was rife with technical glitches.

items.title: 12/21: CBS Weekend News
items.description: At least 5 dead, 200 injured in German Christmas market car attack; Chicago elf brings comfort and joy to children in hospitals

items.title: Here’s a look at the $100 billion in disaster relief in the government spending bill
items.description: Congress is allocating more than $100 billion in emergency aid to address extensive damage caused by hurricane and other disasters.

items.title: After shooting, Wisconsin school and church lean into Christmas message for comfort
Operation Santa skips the reindeer for a C17 military cargo plane
'I heard rumbling and shattering glass': Eyewitness describes Christmas market attack
items.description: One woman describes how her boyfriend was dragged away from her after being hit by the car being used as a weapon.

items.title: Two US Navy pilots shot down over Red Sea in apparent 'friendly fire' incident, US military says

items.title: Lara Trump withdraws name from consideration for US Senate
items.description: The president-elect's daughter-in-law had been spoken of as a replacement for Senator Marco Rubio.

items.title: German Christmas market attack suspect remanded
items.description: A man suspected of the murders of a nine-year-old boy and four women at the market in Magdeburg has appeared in court.

items.title: Party City files for bankruptcy and plans to shutter nationwide

items.title: 2 U.S. Navy pilots eject safely when jet shot down by likely "friendly fire"
items.description: An F/A-18 fighter jet was "mistakenly fired on" by the guided missile cruiser USS Gettysburg, authorities said.

items.title: Scott Peterson: Case in Question

items.title: FDA approves weight loss drug Zepbound to treat obstructive sleep apnea
items.description: The FDA said studies have shown that by aiding weight loss, Zepbound improves sleep apnea symptoms in some patients.
